actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to reduce and then repeal the credit against the minimum wage which is based on tips received by tipped employees.

summary.text: Reduces the credit under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 against the minimum wage which is based on tips received by employees. Repeals such provisions effective one year after the enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to reduce and then repeal the credit against the minimum wage which is based on tips received by tipped employees.
